night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places. Wind around west 2-8, on islands and coast in gusts 13 m/s. Air temperature -5..-11, on coast locally 0..-3°C.
night.sea:
Jan 17, 2021 17:15 UTC
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 19:00 Jan 17 to 19:00 UTC Jan 18, 2021.
Weather summary: weak Trough of Low over Baltic Sea.
No warnings.
Northern Baltic, Gulf of Finland, Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga: wind around west 4-9, in gusts up to 13 m/s. Snow in many places, in daytime at sea possible sleet too. Visibility mainly moderate.
night.peipsi: Wind around west 2-7 m/s. Light snow. Visibility moderate. Air temperature -6..-8°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places, on islands possible sleet too. Southwest wind 3-9, on islands and coast in gusts 13 m/s. Air temperature -1..-7, in the southern part to -10, on islands coast locally +2°C.
day.peipsi: Southwest wind 3-7 m/s. Light snow. Visibility moderate. Air temperature -5..-6°C.

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places, on islands sleet too. Southwest, south wind 3-9, on coast in gusts 13 m/s. Air temperature in western and northern Estonia -3..-9, on the coast of islands locally 0..+2, in eastern and southern Estonia -9..-15°C.

day.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places, on islands sleet too, afternoon the probability for precipiation decreasing. South, southwest wind 4-9, on coast in gusts up to 14 m/s, in the evening backing on islands southeast and some increasing. Air temperature in western Estonia -1..-7, central and eastern Estonia -7..-12°C.

night.text: Partly cloudy. Locally some snow. South, southeast wind 5-11, on islands and coastal areas in gusts up to 16 m/s. Air temperature on islands -3..-8, in mainland -9..-15, locally -18°C.

day.text: Clouding up. From islands snow and snow drift. Southeast wind 5-12, on islands and coastal areas in gusts 15-18 m/s. Air temperature on islands -1..-5, in mainland -5..-10, eastern part locally -12°C, in the evening rising.

night.text: Overcast. Snow and snow drift, from islands turnes to sleet and rain, glazed ice. Southeast wind 5-12, on coast in gusts 15-18 m/s, after midnight veering from islands to south, souhtwest. Air temperature on islands 0..+5, in mainland -1..-7, eastern Estonia up to -10°C.

day.text: Cloudy wiht bright spells. Snow, sleet and rain, glazed ice. In the evening precipitation dying out. Wind is veering to south, southwest in all regions 5-10, on coast in gusts up to 15 m/s. Air temperatur will rise between 0..+5°C.
